appropriations: There is appropriated out of the university of Hawaii conference center revolving fund the sum of $ or so much thereof as may be necessary for fiscal year 2025-2026. [8] The sum appropriated shall be expended by the university of Hawaii for purposes of this Act. [8] Section 5 of this Act, which contains the appropriation, shall take effect on July 1, 2025. [8]
policy_impact: Creating a single University of Hawaii Conference Center Revolving Fund, with each campus having an account in the overarching fund, would allow all campuses to standardize conference center programs across all campuses while eliminating redundant provisions. [9] Structuring the University of Hawaii Conference Center Revolving Fund in this manner would make it consistent with other existing University of Hawaii funds, including the Tuition and Fees Special Fund. [9]
revenue_sources: The university may establish and collect fees and charges for the costs of providing these services. [8] All fees, charges, and other moneys collected in conjunction with the conference center programs of the university shall be deposited in separate accounts within the revolving fund. [8]
updates_from_previous_fiscal_note: Your Committee on Higher Education has amended this measure by making it effective upon its approval, and making technical, nonsubstantive amendments for the purposes of clarity and consistency. [9] The Committee is in accord with the intent and purpose of H.B. No. 1169, H.D. 1, as amended, and recommends that it pass Second Reading in the form attached hereto as H.B. No. 1169, H.D. 1, S.D. 1, and be referred to your Committee on Ways and Means. [9]
